About.title: About Me
About.paragraph: As a <medium>Full-stack Developer</medium>, my expertise lies in creating seamless and intuitive user experiences. I specialize in using cutting-edge technologies to produce high-quality web applications. Specifically, I have vast knowledge of <medium>Laravel, Next.js and Nest.js</medium>, which allow me to build complex and dynamic applications with ease.

Contact.title: Contact Me
Contact.paragraph: Please contact me directly at <mailto>zoltan.r.bogar@gmail.com</mailto> or through this form.

Intro.intro: <bold>Hey, I'm Zoltan.</bold> I'm a <bold>full-stack developer</bold> with <bold>8+ years</bold> of experience. I build things for the web. My focus is <underline>Laravel, Nest.js and Next.js</underline>.

Footer.about: <semi>About this website:</semi> built with React & Next.js (App Router & Server Actions), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS Framer Motion, React Email & Resend, Vercel hosting.
